meta.name: 高教公民Progressive Scholars Group
meta.about:
高教公民 是新時代的香港學者網絡，以「學術自主、公民自強」為使命！
Progressive Scholars Group (PSG) is a scholars network which aims at promoting “academic autonomy and a strong civil society” for Hong Kong.
